us.ba3.me.markers

Interface MarkerMapDelegate


  • public interface MarkerMapDelegate

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void tapOnMarker(java.lang.String mapName, int markerUid, java.lang.String markerMetaData, float markerWeight, PointF geographicLocation, PointF screenPoint, PointF markerPoint)
      Called when a marker is tapped on.
      void updateMarkerInfo(MarkerInfo markerInfo, java.lang.String mapName)
      Called when the mapping engine needs information for a marker in a marker layer.

    • Method Detail

      • updateMarkerInfo

        void updateMarkerInfo(MarkerInfo markerInfo,
                    java.lang.String mapName)
        Called when the mapping engine needs information for a marker in a marker layer. When called, you should populate the provided MEMarkerInfo object.
        Parameters:
        markerInfo - Object for you to populate that describes the marker.
        mapName - The name of the map.

      • tapOnMarker

        void tapOnMarker(java.lang.String mapName,
               int markerUid,
               java.lang.String markerMetaData,
               float markerWeight,
               PointF geographicLocation,
               PointF screenPoint,
               PointF markerPoint)
        Called when a marker is tapped on.
        Parameters:
        mapName - The name of the map.
        markerUid - For markers loaded from databases, the row id of the marker in the database. Zero otherwise.
        markerWeight - The weight of the marker (for clustered marker maps).
        geographicLocation - The longitude, latitude of the marker (PointF.x = longitude, PointF.y = latitude)
        screenPoint - The point on the screen on where the tap occurred.
        markerPoint - The relative point within the marker where the tap occurred. Useful for markers that have button UI on them.
